name: Tap Tap Soccer Juggle
description:
Tap to juggle the soccer ball to keep it up in the air. Unlock new balls and backgrounds as you progress into becoming the best soccer ball juggler in the world!

Keep tapping to see how long you can juggle!

Get new soccer balls when you juggle 3,5,10,25, etc... times!

Get new soccer themed backgrounds for how many times you tap throughout your soccer juggle career. First background unlocks at 250 taps!
